quotes.quoted: There are always many ways to look good
quotes.arti: Selalu banyak cara untuk terlihat baik

quotes.quoted: Giving in doesn't mean you lose
Having no interest in anyone is so peaceful
quotes.arti: Tidak tertarik dengan siapapun, itu sangat damai

quotes.quoted: Every experience adds a layer to your wisdom
Your journey may be slow, but quitting won't speed it up
quotes.arti: Perjalananmu mungkin lambat, tapi menyerah tidak akan mempercepatnya

quotes.quoted: Failure is not the end, but a path to your best version
quotes.arti: Kegagalan bukan akhir, tapi jalan menuju versi terbaik dari dirimu

quotes.quoted: Don't compare your journey to others. Focus on your own steps
quotes.arti: Jangan bandingkan perjalananmu dengan orang lain. Fokuslah pada langkahmu sendiri
